original_title: Shooting incidents continue; man injured in Thalangama
original_body_lines: A 41-year-old man was injured after he was shot at in a house at Thalawathugoda in Thalangama a short while ago.
Police said two men had arrived on a motorcycle and opened fire at the victim.
The motive of the shooting is yet to be revealed and the Thalangama Police are conducting investigations to apprehend the suspects.
